channel.title: CVE Feed for NetApp -- SnapCenter Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NetApp -- SnapCenter Server

item.title: CVE-2017-15515|2024-09-17T00:26:02.108Z -- netapp -- snapcenter%20server
item.description: NetApp SnapCenter Server prior to 4.0 is susceptible to cross site scripting vulnerability that could allow a privileged user to inject arbitrary scripts into the custom secondary policy label field.

item.title: CVE-2018-5482|2024-09-17T00:16:19.973Z -- netapp -- snapcenter%20server
item.description: NetApp SnapCenter Server prior to 4.1 does not set the secure flag for a sensitive cookie in an HTTPS session which can allow the transmission of the cookie in plain text over an unencrypted channel.
